entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's wand is mentioned as being raised by Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one who raises Hermione's wand and jumps to his feet.

entities.name: light
entities.description: The light is described as moving soundlessly towards Harry Potter.

entities.name: trees
entities.description: Trees are mentioned as being in front of the light and becoming pitch-black in silhouette.

relationships.description: The light is moving towards the trees.
